description:
Grandma comes to visit, and Kululu changes places with her?!  Then Giroro goes out on a date with Keroro`s-mother-in-Natsumi`s-body, while Natsumi-in-Keroro`s-mother`s-body gets dragged off to a hot spring with Keroro`s father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Assault Admiral! / Giroro, Still With This Chuck
ケロロ 提督殿強襲! であります / ギロロ チャックはそのままで! であります
